_header: Hot and moist is Aquarius as is the air men telleth us before
_description: Verses on the Signs and the Twelve Months — twelve quatrains

BodDig88.First Lines:
Hote and moyste ys Aquariusas ys the Eþer men tellyth vs by
                    fore…
BodDig88.Last Lines:
…A merke on his hedde shalhaueand of a yoynt he shall be
                    revyd
BodDig88.Note:
At the end: ‘Explicit þe signes and þe xij
                    Monthis’.
